argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpsubid.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpsubid.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpsubid.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | grpsubadd0sub.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 3 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X .+ ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X .+ ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 5, 2 | #P_grpinvval2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) = ( .0. .- Y ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) = ( .0. .- Y ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = ( X .+ ( .0. .- Y ) ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X .+ ( .0. .- Y ) ) ) |
